LanguageData.IronSkinElixir.label: Iron skin elixir effect
LanguageData.IronSkinElixir.description: Hardens skin, allowing to survive multiple attacks.
LanguageData.BerserkElixir.label: Berserk elixir effect
LanguageData.BerserkElixir.description: Boosts metabolism, increases speed and eyesight. Great for combat.
LanguageData.HealingElixir.label: Healing elixir effect
LanguageData.HealingElixir.description: Great for fighting infestations and diseases.
LanguageData.GrowerElixir.label: Grower elixir effect
LanguageData.GrowerElixir.description: Accelerates fine motor skills, which greatly speeds up the speed of harvesting.
LanguageData.MinerElixir.label: Miner elixir effect
LanguageData.MinerElixir.description: Increases the strength and accuracy of the work, this has a significant effect on the speed of mining operations.
